Author: Nearby_Associate
Text: Thank you so much for your kind words

Author: fuck_you_get_pumped
Text: i understand how you're feeling. i'm in the same boat, and know how much it hurts to see your loved one suffering.          i've found that the best thing to do, in my case at least, is to just leave the whole subject alone and try not to worry about it too much. you would never trigger him on purpose. it's not your fault. try to trust him to not get too sick. you know that recovery won't happen unless he wants it, so just do your best to show him that you love him just as he is. i wish both of you the best.
